title: Vitriol card
data:
{{Version027}} {{flavour|The card depicts an oklob plant, dripping with its distinctive corrosive sap.}} The Vitriol card deals [[acid]] attacks: Power level 0: weak [[corrosive bolt]] Power level 1: stronger [[corrosive bolt]] Power level 2: attempts to corrode all enemies in line of sight, followed by the strongest corrosive bolt. ==History== The Vitriol card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] over the past several versions. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.11]] ![[0.12]] ![[0.13]] ![[0.14]] ![[0.15]] ![[0.16]] ![[0.17]] ![[0.18]] ![[0.19]] and beyond |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of destruction|Destruction]]
